comments: Livers (DET) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Grant (DET) establishes himself in a wide screening position in the path of Herro (MIA) but the marginal contact during the pick does not influence Herro's defensive play.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Hayes (DET). The former places his hands on Hayes' side and collapses his arms as he absorbs contact on the pick.
Bey (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Grant (DET) legally contests Strus' (MIA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Strus (MIA) and Grant (DET) jostle for positioning in the post and then disengage.
Adebayo (MIA) is extending his arm into a vertical position and marginal contact occurs following the release of Stewart's (DET) shot.
Stewart (DET) moves laterally into Adebayo's (MIA) path off ball and initiates contact which affects his FOM.
Hayes (DET) releases the ball in less than five seconds after receiving it.
RLS shows Herro (MIA) reaches in and hooks his left arm inside the right arm of Grant (DET). Herro continues to reach for the ball and the arm contact causes Grant to lose control of the ball.
Hayes (DET) does not inbound the ball in less than five seconds after receiving it.

Grant (DET) gathers the ball and initiates contact with Tucker (MIA). The former bounces off of the defender and Tucker's left forearm comes out slightly but the marginal contact does not impact the post shot attempt in the paint.

Hayes (DET) makes direct contact with the ball as he swipes down to dislodge the ball away from Lowry (MIA).  Incidental arm to arm contact occurs when Lowry lifts his arm into Hayes' following the dislodge.
Herro (MIA) makes some contact with the off-arm of Bey (DET) as he is pulling it off of the ball. The contact to the off-arm is marginal and does not alter Bey's post shot attempt at the rim.
Bey (DET) commits a take foul on Lowry (MIA).
Joseph (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Herro (MIA) and some marginal contact occurs as Herro fights over the screen.
Adebayo (MIA) touches the ball after it has hit the backboard and still has a chance to score.
